wikipedia_page.main: Richard Brookes (fl. 1908–1920) was an English professional footballer who played as a full-back for various clubs in the early years of the 20th century.

response: Richard Brooks (1912–1992) was an American screenwriter, film director and novelist.
Richard Brooks also may refer to:
*Richard Brooks (actor) (born 1962), American actor, singer and director
*Richard Brooks (captain) (1765–1833), ship's captain and early Australian settler
*Richard Brooks (journalist), English investigative journalist and author
